message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it valuable and worth the investment. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,200,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  Given the value I see in this product, I'm willing to pay $1,050,000. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

I understand you're looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1,150,000. This is my best price for now, but I'm open to further discussion.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,150,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $1,100,000. I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1,080,000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm still open to discussing further if you're willing to meet me at this price.
